thread.section_title: Leibish & Co. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Leibish & Co. | leibish.com
thread.title: Ali V.
thread.title_full: Leibish & Co. reviewed by Ali V.

author: Ali V.
title: Ali V.
text: I decided after 16 years of work and having my first child that I wanted to buy a "dream ring" for myself. I live in NYC, so am fortunate to be nearby some of the most reputable jewelers in the world. I looked, with intent to buy, at Tiffany's, Graff, and Cartier. Eventually, I came across Leibish & Co. I put Leibish in competition with the best of the best as noted above. Ultimately, thanks to their impressive inventory, exceptional customer service, phenomenal product knowledge, and a no-pressure sales environment, they won my business. Not only is the final product better and more beautiful than anything I saw at any 5th avenue store, the process was an absolute pleasure. Meira, and especially Itzik, thank you. I look forward to doing business with you again.
